full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,YI GE'I THOB THANG NYER MKHO RAB GSAL ME LONG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B TSIG GI 'DAB MAS MA BSGRIBS 'DI, ,GNAD BSDUS 'BRAS BU GA-YUR ZA BA, ,BLO GSAL DON GNYER DGA' STON DU, ,DBYANGS CAN DGA' BA'I BLO GROS SPEL, , `TSIG NYUNG GNAD DON NYER MKHO RNAMS, ,RAB GSAL LEGS BSHAD ME LONG 'DI, ,BOD YIG BRI KLOG THAMS CAD LA, ,PHAN PA'I BSAM PAS DPAR DU BSGRUBS, ,DGE 'DIS MKHA' MNYAM 'GRO BA KUN, ,RNAM DAG KLOG PA LA BRTEN NAS, ,DRUG CU RTZA BZHI'I DBYANGS SNYAN GYIS, ,DAM CHOS STON PA NYID GYUR CIG ,(CES PA 'DI 'ANG SHES RAB RAB RGYAS @005A *, ,KYIS RAB BYUNG BCO LNGA PA'I DPAL GDONG ZHES PA CHU MO BYA LO'I HOR ZLA DRUG PA'I GNAM GANG LA BRIS PA DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,PAR 'DI HAL HA KHU RE CHEN MO'I CHOS GRVA CHE BA BKRA SHIS CHOS 'PHEL GRVA TSANG GI PAR KHANG DU BZHUGS SU GSOL BA LAGS,, ,,)
author_simple: DBYANGS CAN DGA' BA'I BLO GROS,
